column4: does anyone have the time to help me get windows 7 to boot from grub? I have tried a bunch of things and can't get it
i just installed windows 7 and its a bit different than vista in terms of partitioning

You have to put the Windows 7 disk back in, and repair the boot process..? I don't quite remember. It's because you overwrote the bootloader with GRUB and you need to put it back in the Windows partition. Then if GRUB doesn't see Win7, there's a grub-update I believe.
